title: Sunshine Holdings appoints S. Renganathan to its Board of Directors
body_lines: Sunshine Holdings (CSE: SUN) announced the appointment of Sivakrishnarajah Renganathan (S. Renganathan) to the Company’s Board as an Independent Non-Executive Director with effect from 27th May, 2022. With the new appointment, the Board of Sunshine Holdings will be comprised of 11 Directors, eight of which are non-executive, independent directors.

With a rich tenure of 41 years in the banking sector, Renganathan is a financial savant who has contributed to the success, growth and direction of financial markets in key leadership positions at several top-tier, local and foreign financial institutions such as Commercial Bank of Ceylon – Sri Lanka, Bangladesh operations acquired from Credit Agricole Indosuez – Bangladesh, and Commercial Bank of Maldives.
